full_summary:
# 2023-01-11 Tender Announcement: Invitation to Provide Quotes for Digital Radiography (DR) Imaging Systems

## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3743819195
* **Notice Reference Number**: WS3743819195-Doc3823270951
* **Solicitation Title**: Digital Radiography (DR) Imaging Systems

## Background
Correctional Services Canada, Health Services are seeking quotes for two Digital Radiography (DR) Imaging Systems. One DR Image System will be installed at Kent Institution, and the other at Matsqui Institution. The system must be capable of producing high-quality medical images in a radiographic setting.

## Solicitation Method
- **Notice Type**: Request for Quote
- **Procurement Method**: **Competitive – Selective Tendering**

## Evaluation Criteria
The quote will be evaluated based on the **Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price**.

## Solicitation Requirements

* The Digital Radiography (DR) Imaging System must meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation document.
* The bidder must demonstrate a thorough understanding of the Health Services’ requirements.
* The system must be capable of producing high-quality medical images in a radiographic setting.

## Important Dates

* **Publication Date**: January 11, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 1, 2023 2:00 PM EST (Local Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 15, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2023

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entity Name**: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
* **End User Entity Address**: 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P0P9, Canada

## Quote Queries and Submission
For any queries or to submit a quote, please contact:
Samantha Phelan (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [samantha.phelan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:samantha.phelan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Distribution of Solicitation Documents
This solicitation document is available electronically on the **Ariba Discovery Portal**: http://dis
